name: 80 Days In Outer Space prototype
description:
a prototype of a game that i'm making devlogs on

playlist of the devlogs; https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqk8p01xKy50KybbUpuw-qPT0fnQhs16-

controls:

wasd to move

space to jump

left/right arrow to change gun

left mouse button to shoot

up arrow to add ammo

ctrl to crouch

shift to sprint
